Hi Robinda. Thanks for the Feluda. 

I'm looking for particular Feluda TV series aired by DD7, acted by the original stars (Soumitra & other two from Shonar Kella), directed by Satyajit himself. Nobody did better than him afterwards.

Those who don't know about it surely missed a lot. I live outside and helpless here. You or anybody should upload it. Otherwise this famous original series will be lost forever. Thanks.
